Verses: 1 en Dhevane, En Dhevane, En Ennaik Kaivitteer? Enakku Udhavi Seyyaamalum, Naan Kadharich Sollum Vaarththaigalaik Kelaamalum En Dhooramaayirukkireer?
2 en Dhevane, Naan Pagalile Kooppidugiren, Uththaravukodeer; Iravile Kooppidugiren, Enakku Amaidhalillai.
3 isravelin Thudhigalukkul Vaasamaayirukkira Dhevareere Parisuththar.
4 engal Pidhaakkal Ummidaththil Nambikkai Vaiththaargal; Nambina Avargalai Neer Viduviththeer.
5 ummai Nokkik Kooppittuth Thappinaargal; Ummai Nambi Vetkappattuppogaadhirundhaargal.
6 naano Oru Puzhu, Manushanalla; Manusharaal Nindhikkappattum, Janangalaal Avamadhikkappattum Irukkiren.
7 ennaip Paarkkiravargalellaarum Ennaip Pariyaasampanni, Udhattaip Pidhukki, Thalaiyaith Thulukki:
8 karththarmel Nambikkaiyaayirundhaane, Avar Ivanai Viduvikkattum; Ivanmel Piriyamaayirukkiraare, Ippozhudhu Ivanai Meettuvidattum Engiraargal.
9 neere Ennaik Karppaththilirundhu Eduththavar; En Thaayin Mulaippaalai Naan Ungaiyil Ennai Ummudaiyaperil Nambikkaiyaayirukkappannineer.
10 karppaththilirundhu Velippattabodhe Umadhu Saarbil Vizhundhen; Naan En Thaayin Vayitril Irundhadhumudhal Neer En Dhevanaayirukkireer.
11 ennai Vittuth Dhooramaagaadheyum; Aabaththu Kittiyirukkiradhu, Sagaayarum Illai.
12 anegam Kaalaigal Ennaich Soozhndhirukkiradhu; Paasaan Dhesaththup Balaththa Erudhugal Ennai Valaindhukondadhu.
13 peeri Kerchchikkira Singaththaippol, Enmel Thangal Vaayaith Thirakkiraargal.
14 thanneeraippola Ootrunden; En Elumbugalellaam Kattuvittadhu, En Irudhayam Mezhugupolaagi, En Kudalgalin Naduve Urugitru.
15 en Belan Ottaippol Kaaindhadhu; En Naavu Melvaayode Ottikkondadhu; Ennai Maranaththoolile Podugireer.
16 naaigal Ennaich Soozhndhirukkiradhu; Pollaadhavargalin Koottam Ennai Valaindhukondadhu; En Kaigalaiyum En Kaalgalaiyum Uruvak Kuththinaargal.
17 en Elumbugalaiyellaam Naan Ennalaam; Avargal Ennai Nokkip Paarththukkondirukkiraargal.
18 en Vasthirangalaith Thangalukkulle Pangittu, En Udaiyinperil Seettuppodugiraargal.
19 aanaalum Karththaave, Neer Enakkuth Dhooramaagaadheyum; En Belane, Enakkuch Sagaayampannath Theeviriththukkollum.
20 en Aaththumaavaip Pattayaththirkum, Enakku Arumaiyaanadhai Naaigalin Thushtaththanaththirkum Thappuviyum.
21 ennaich Singaththin Vaayilirundhu Ratchiyum; Naan Kaandaamirugaththin Kombugalil Irukkumbodhu Enakkuch Sevikoduththarulineer.
22 ummudaiya Naamaththai En Sagodhararukku Ariviththu, Sabainaduvil Ummaith Thudhippen.

23 karththarukkup Bayappadugiravargale, Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Yaakkobin Sandhadhiyaare, Neengal Ellaarum Avaraik Ganampannungal; Isravelin Vamsaththaare, Neengal Ellaarum Avarperil Bayabakthiyaayirungal.

24 ubaththiravappattavanudaiya Ubaththiravaththai Avar Arpamaayennaamalum Aruvarukkaamalum, Thammudaiya Mugaththai Avanukku Maraikkaamalumirundhu, Thammai Nokki Avan Kooppidugaiyil Avanaik Kettarulinaar.
25 magaa Sabaiyile Naan Ummaith Thudhippen; Avarukkup Bayappadugiravargalukku Munbaaga En Poruththanaigalaich Seluththuven.
26 saandhagunamullavargal Pusiththuth Thirupthiyadaivaargal; Karththaraith Thedugiravargal Avaraith Thudhippaargal; Ungal Irudhayam Endrendraikkum Vaazhum.
27 boomiyin Ellaigalellaam Ninaivukoorndhu Karththaridaththil Thirumbum; Jaadhigaludaiya Sandhadhigalellaam Umadhu Samugaththil Thozhudhukollum.
28 raajyam Karththarudaiyadhu; Avar Jaadhigalai Aalugiravar.

29 boomiyin Selvavaangal Yaavarum Pusiththup Panindhukolvaargal; Puzhudhiyil Irangugiravargal Yaavarum Avarukku Munbaaga Vananguvaargal. Oruvanum Than Aaththumaa Azhiyaadhapadi Adhaik Kaakkakkoodaadhe.
30 oru Sandhadhi Avaraich Sevikkum; Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Adhu Aandavarudaiya Sandhadhi Ennappadum.
31 avargal Vandhu: Avare Ivaigalaich Seydhaar Endru Pirakkappogiravargalukku Avarudaiya Needhiyai Arivippaargal.
